title: Creating Campaign - Successfully create a txt2screen campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager with a user that has permission to create a txt2screen campaign
And you are on the New Txt2Sceen Campaign
custom_steps:
When the user enters in the Campaign Name
And taps on create
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new txt2screen campaign

title: Creating Campaign - Attempt to create a campaign without campaign name
custom_preconds:
Given the user has ability to create a txt2screen campaign
And the user is on the New text2sceen campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the create button
custom_expected:
Then the New Text2screen campaign page will reload
And there will be error text 'Required Field' in red next to campaign name

title: Creating Campaign - Verify character count is accurate
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a text2screen campaign
And the user is on the New Text2screen campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user enter text in either of the following areas:

Max Texts Exceeded SMS MT
Response SMS MT
custom_expected: Then the Characters Remaining number should update accordingly

title: Creating Campaign - Verify Help links
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2screen campaign
And the user is on the 'New txt2screen campaign' page
custom_steps: When the user taps the help links next to most fields
custom_expected: Then the popup notification will be relevant to the field

title: Creating Campaign - Creating a text2screen campaign while one is already running
custom_preconds:
Given there is already a text2screen campaign running under any user
And the user has the ability to create a text2screen campaign
And the user is on the new text2screen campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user enters in a campaign name
And taps the create button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page of the new campaign
And in the start campaign section it will say:

"You cannot start this Campaign because other Campaign(s): atsign, are running that use the same combination of keyword(s) and short code."

title: Editing Campaign - Edit campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign
And that campaign has never been started
custom_steps:
When the user updates a field like the confirmation message text
And taps the update button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And the field should reflect the update

title: Starting Campaign - Starting campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign created
And that campaign is either in the created or stopped state
And the user is on the campaign page for that txt2screen campaign
custom_steps:
When the user taps the start button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on click here
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And the start button will gone
And there will be a stop button
And there will be no edit button
And in campaign run summary section there will be a new row
And the end date for that row will be 'Running[view]'

title: Starting Campaign - Starting campaign from All Campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign either in a created or stopped state
And the user is on the All Campaigns page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the created or stopped button in the action column
And taps on ok button on the confirmation popup
And taps close
custom_expected:
Then the All Campaigns page will reload
And in the action column for that campaign the button will say Running
And the campaign will be filtered with the to the top with the other running campaigns
And the Last Run date will update to the current date and time
And the the row's text will turn green

title: Testing Campaign - Send text to campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2win campaign created
And that campaign has been started
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text to the short code
And taps the inbox
custom_expected: Then the user will see the text they just sent in

title: Testing Campaign - Send text with an '@' symbol in it
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign created
And that campaign has been started
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text with an '@' to the short code
And taps the inbox
custom_expected: Then the user will see the text they just sent in

title: Testing Campaign - Testing max texts per user - campaign run
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2screen campaign
And there is a txt2screen campaign
And that campaign has a max texts limit set
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text to the short code of the txt2screen campaign
And repeats sending a text to the short code until they hit the max limit
And the user will receive the max text exceeded sms MT
And every time the user sends a text to the short code while the campaign is running
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the max text exceeded sms MT

title: Testing Campaign - Max text campaign user sends text with new campaign run
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign running
And there is a max text limit set
And there is a user that has hit this limit
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps the stop button
And taps the start button
And the user sends a text to the shortcode
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the "Confirm MT message for text" MT

title: Testing Campaign - Testing max texts per user - day
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2screen campaign
And there is a txt2security campaign
And that campaign has a max texts limit set
custom_steps:
When the user sends a text to the short code of the txt2screen campaign
And repeats sending a text to the short code until they hit the max limit
And the user will receive the max text exceeded sms MT
And when the user waits till the next day
And sends another text to the short code
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the normal response and NOT the exceeded sms MT

title: Testing Campaign - Testing campaign timeout
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a txt2screen campaign
And there is a txt2security campaign
And the timeout field is set
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user starts the campaign
And the timeout period is set to 1 hour
custom_expected: Then in 1 hour the campaign will automatically stop

title: Testing Campaign -  Send help text
custom_preconds: Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
custom_steps: When the user sends 'help' to the short code
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the help mt

title: Testing Campaign - Approve message - 1 message
custom_preconds:
Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
And there is already a text in the inbox
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps the radio button next to the message they wish to approve
And taps on the approve button
custom_expected:
Then the message will be removed from the 'New' queue
And when the user taps on the 'Approved' queue they will see the approved message

title: Testing Campaign - Approve message - multiple messages
custom_preconds:
Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
And there is already a texts in the inbox
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps the radio buttons next to the messages they wish to approve
And taps on the approve button
custom_expected:
Then the messages will be removed from the 'New' queue
And when the user taps on the 'Approved' queue they will see the approved messages

title: Testing Campaign -  Verify the refresh works in inbox
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign running
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps on the 'Turn on Refresh' link
And sends a text to the short code
custom_expected: Then the user will see their text update in the inbox

title: Testing Campaign - Delete message - 1 message - from new queue
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign
And there are texts in the inbox
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps on the radio button next to the message the user wants to delete
And taps on the delete button
custom_expected:
Then the message will be removed from the from the new queue
And then if you tap on the deleted queue will see the message in that tab

title: Testing Campaign - Delete message - multiple messages - new queue
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign running
And there are texts in inbox
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps on the radio buttons next to the messages the user wants to delete
And taps the delete button
custom_expected:
Then the messages will be removed from the new queue
And if the user taps on the deleted tab will see the deleted messages

title: Testing Campaign - Delete message - from approved queue
custom_preconds:
Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
And there are text messages in the approved queue
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps on the approved tab
And taps on the radio button next to the messages that the user wants deleted
And taps on the delete button
custom_expected:
Then the message will be removed from the approved queue
And the message will be in the deleted queue

title: Testing Campaign - Undelete message
custom_preconds:
Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
And there are text message that have been deleted in the inbox
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the inbox link
And taps on the deleted tab
And taps on the radio button next to the messages they wish to undelete
And taps on undelete button
custom_expected:
Then the message will be removed from that deleted queue
And if the user taps on the new queue will see the message

title: Testing Campaign - Verify previous run data
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign running
And there are previous runs of this campaign
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the start date link in the 'Campaign Run Summary' of previous runs of the campaign
custom_expected:
Then the user will brought to campaign run data for that run
And the information will be accurate

title: Stopping Campaign - Stopping campaign from All Campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign either in a created or stopped state
And the user is on the All Campaigns page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the running button in the action column
And taps on ok button on the confirmation popup
And taps close
custom_expected:
Then the All Campaigns page will reload
And in the action column for that campaign will be a stopped button
And the row's text will turn to black

title: Stopping Campaign - Stopping campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a running txt2screen campaign
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the stop button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on the home button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to the campaign page
And the campaign will be stopped

title: Expiring Campaign - Expire a txt2screen campaign - running campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign that is running
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the expire button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to an error page that says:

"This campaign is currently running and cannot be expired."

title: Expiring Campaign - Expire a txt2screen campaign - stopped campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign that is stopped
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the expire button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on the 'click here to return home'
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the all campaign page
And the text2screen campaign they just expired will not be shown by default because expired campaigns are hidden by default

title: Clone Campaign - Clone a txt2screen campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a txt2screen campaign
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the clone button
And enters in the new campaign name
And taps on the create button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new campaign
